visual_description.scene: two test tubes on LED panel with backlighting from below, dark background

plasma.notes: plasma is homogeneous, without visible clots or sediment; left test tube slightly darker than right; rounded meniscus shadows visible at bottom of both

visual_description.scene: one test tube on LED panel with backlighting from below, dark background

plasma.notes: small air bubbles visible in lower part; plasma is homogeneous; rounded meniscus shadow at bottom

visual_description.scene: one test tube on LED panel with backlighting from below, dark background

plasma.notes: plasma is homogeneous, without bubbles; rounded meniscus shadow visible at bottom; slightly more saturated color than 21.1.1

visual_description.scene: three test tubes on light surface (paper), held by hand
visual_description.view: horizontal side view, test tubes lying parallel

plasma.notes: rounded gelatinous clots (thrombi) visible at bottom of all three test tubes; clots are beige-yellowish in color; plasma around clots is transparent; label visible on bottom test tube; text on paper visible under test tubes

visual_description.scene: four test tubes on light surface (paper with protocol text)
visual_description.view: horizontal side view, test tubes lying parallel

plasma.notes: rounded gelatinous clot visible at bottom of each test tube; labels with markings: 0.1.2, 21.1.1, 19.1.1, 0.1 (partially visible); clots of unequal size; printed experiment protocol text visible under test tubes

photos.pdf_caption: 3 test tubes on a dark surface

visual_description.scene: three test tubes on dark textured surface
visual_description.view: horizontal side view, test tubes lying parallel

plasma.notes: rounded white-yellowish clots visible in all three test tubes; clots are compact, positioned at bottom; plasma around them appears transparent; dark background allows better visibility of clot contours

visual_description.scene: three test tubes on light surface, horizontal view
visual_description.view: horizontal side view, macro on clot area

plasma.notes: rounded gelatinous yellowish-beige clots visible in all three test tubes; clots are approximately equal in size; plasma around clots is transparent

visual_description.scene: three test tubes on light surface (paper), top view of bottom
visual_description.view: top view of test tube bottoms with labels

plasma.notes: beige-yellowish gelatinous clot visible at bottom of each test tube; labels with markings: 0.1.1, 19.1.1 (inverted), 21.1.1; clots are rounded; plasma level is low

visual_description.scene: three test tubes in hand, on dark surface background, vacutainers and blue glove visible in background
visual_description.view: vertical, view of test tube bottoms from below

plasma.notes: pronounced rounded yellow clot visible at bottom of each test tube; clots are bright yellow, contrasting well with transparent plasma above; labels 21.1.1 and 0.1.1 visible on left test tube; vacutainers with red caps visible in background

visual_description.scene: four test tubes on light surface (paper), horizontal
visual_description.view: horizontal side view, macro on clot area

plasma.notes: rounded gelatinous clots visible in all four test tubes; upper clot (19.1.1) is larger with visible whitish film; lower clots are more compact; plasma around them is transparent; text shows through under test tubes

visual_description.scene: three test tubes in hand on dark background
visual_description.view: vertical, view of test tube bottoms from below

plasma.notes: rounded gelatinous yellow clot visible at bottom of each test tube; plasma above clots is transparent; clot in middle test tube appears slightly less dense; plasma volume in test tubes is approximately equal

visual_description.scene: three test tubes on light surface, finger holding the top one
visual_description.view: horizontal side view, macro on clot area

plasma.notes: large rounded dark beige clots visible in all three test tubes; clots appear dense with sharply defined edges; plasma around them is transparent with slight yellowish tinge

visual_description.scene: three test tubes in hand on dark background, lit from below
visual_description.view: vertical, view of test tube bottoms from below

plasma.notes: rounded yellowish-whitish clot visible at bottom of each test tube; clots are compact, approximately equal in size; plasma above is transparent with yellowish tinge; plasma volume in all three test tubes is similar
